amendment.description: An amendment numbered 10 printed in the Congressional Record to add a new proviso providing new eligiblity requirements for grant recipients.

action.text: Mr. Calvert raised a point of order against the Kildee amendment (A030). Mr. Calvert stated that the amendment seeks to change existing law and constitutes legislation in an appropriations bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A030) offered by Mr. Kildee.
